title: On Our Watch: 20-20 Hindsight
description: In episode three of On Our Watch, we examine the records that were unsealed by this transparency law to piece together what exactly happened on September 14, 2014 when Pedie Perez was shot and killed outside a liquor store by a police officer, Wallace Jensen.
copyright: Copyright 2020-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: On Our Watch: 20-20 Hindsight
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: "Nothing's going to bring my son back, but it's unreal that society keeps allowing these police officers to get away with the same thing over and over again."
itunes:subtitle: "Nothing's going to bring my son back, but it's unreal that society keeps allowing these police officers to get away with the same thing over and over again."
content:encoded: In episode three of On Our Watch, we examine the records that were unsealed by this transparency law to piece together what exactly happened on September 14, 2014 when Pedie Perez was shot and killed outside a liquor store by a police officer, Wallace Jensen.
